issue.title: How can I check which revision is released on apt?

content.raw:
@scpeters I mean which revision of this mercurial repository corresponds to the version of gazebo provided via apt.
Besides `gazebo2`, `gazebo5` is also provided via ROS apt, but the interface package between gazebo and ros (`ros-indigo-gazebo-ros`) still depends on `gazebo2`, so many ROS people still are using gazebo2.
content.html: @scpeters I mean which revision of this mercurial repository corresponds to the version of gazebo provided via apt. Besides gazebo2, gazebo5 is also provided via ROS apt, but the interface package between gazebo and ros (ros-indigo-gazebo-ros) still depends on gazebo2, so many ROS people still are using gazebo2.
